dialogue.string: 1�Entering  �[/Omen
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, ?[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Darkness Beckons.The Brewing Storm.The River Runs Red.Penance.From West to East.Tackling the Problem.An Unending Song.A Rhapsody for the Ages.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Now, listen close...
1�Enter the sanctorium?Yes.No.
1�You should be able to teleport to the Crag of  �[Holla/Dem/Mea] from here.
1�Ready to teleport?Yes.No.
1�How do you respond?It's me!  !Who do you think it is?
1�How do you respond?Weren't you attacked on the way?Are you sure you're well?I'll take things from here!
1�How do you respond?You've done better than I hoped.You still have a ways to go.
1�What do you do?Stay.Leave.

1�?You are unable to make further progress in Rhapsodies of Vana'diel due to an event occurring in the  [Chains of Promathia/Treasures of Aht Urhgan/Wings of the Goddess/Seekers of Adoulin/Rise of the Zilart] mission
1�These whisperings on the wind...are they meant to mock me?
r!�Oh, Master! Not even Altana herself can comprehend the joy I feel at hearing your voice!
1�And to think you followed me to a land that must seem as the end of the world!
e.�M-Master!? Could that truly be you?
1�Master, do you remember when we returned to the mothercrystal?
1�The blessing of Phoenix was with me in full force.
1�And I closed my eyes, pleading her to give you breath once more.
1�But now, Master...You do my heart good.
1�Me? You wish to know what I was doing?
1�I lifted my voice in prayer, and the spirits saw fit to cure me of my ills.
1�I know not whether it was the protection of the Goddess, but I found myself with corporeal form yet again.
1�Master--then I was not the only one?
1�This island is a sacred one. To see it besieged by such vile forces makes my blood boil.
1�Forgive me for being brash, but I would ask for your aid in dealing with them.
1�Master, never let anyone doubt that you remain a stalwart hero.
1�If I may be so bold, please lend me your aid with a small task on this island.
1�I have not the freedom to move from the immediate vicinity.
1�It is all I can do to erect a magicked barrier to prevent the beasts crawling Reisenjima from approaching this location.
1�Master, I understand that your journey has left you weary, but your assistance would be a great boon.
1�Please, lend sword and spell to vanquish the narakas that threaten to overrun me.
1�I would lend my glaive if I could...but Master, let me ask this one boon of you.
1�Master! Wait!
1�?[Lord/Lady]  , you mentioned having one last card to play.
1�Are you so far gone as to think it will actually work!?
1�Iroha, I am so proud of yo
1�?[Lord/Lady]  !
1�I had written you off as vanishing with Selh'teus!
1�Do you know what that does to a man's heart!?
1�?[Lord/Lady]  , what transpired while you were away?
1�So what we have been calling the ??ambassador?? is really an alternate aspect of you...from the future?
1�Indeed. I do not presume to know everything about our martial or spiritual arts, so the possibility of there being something I have overlooked is great.
1�But let us turn to more pressing matters. Lord Selh'teus and Lady Iroha bid you cleanse these woods of a particular blight, did they not?
1�She has reached the end of her rope and can revive no longer...
1�Yet if you were able to converse with Lady Iroha, then some part of her yet remains.
1�Urk...I've never had much of a mind for riddles.
1�Reisenjima Sanctorium...
1�I made a pilgrimage here once, when I was a young boy who barely came up to his father's knees.
1�We came to purify my family's most sacred treasure--the Phoenix Blade.
1�I cannot say for sure. It isn't quite the Emptiness, but beyond that, there is no way of telling.
1�Regardless, this island lacks a stable population because we refer to it as the ??Island of the Gods.?? As such, it is meant to remain sacrosanct.
1�Though the devout are permitted to visit, only those who tend to the sanctorium take up permanent residence.
1�?[Lord/Lady]  , am I to understand that Selh'teus's crystal waits inside?
1�Grk...Not everyone...can be a salty sea dog...
1� , people in the Far East come to call you ??Master,?? correct?
1�Then perhaps you used some technique you learned here.
1�We can at least be grateful that her spirit lives on.
1�We can at least be grateful that her spirit lives on.
1�I concur.
1�And afterwards, we meet up here.
1�Let's do it.
1�G-Gilgamesh...
1�P-putting that aside, we've managed to fulfill Iroha's request!
1�I'd always wanted ta visit here, and it's proven to be well worth the journey.
1�And Aldo here...6Aldo? Gotten over what ails ye?
1�Har har! Just be glad we didn't have ta call ??man overboard!?? when ye were retching o'er the side.
1�Can that e'en be possible? Just what kinda secrets are ye hidin' under those clothes o' yers?
1�Iroha? Then where is she?
1�But ye were still able ta talk to her?
1�Sh-she won't be able ta come back ta us?
1�We might be worried 'bout her, but right now th' best we can do is see her task to conclusion.
1�If helping th' crystal is what we've gotta do, then count us in.
1�Yup. So whaddaya say--lend our friend a hand?
1�And ye know somethin', Tenzen? For such a sacred island, it sure doesn't have many people on it.
1�And what's with all th' black orbs floatin' about?
p!�Aldo, if yer late because of yer seasickness again, so help me...
1�So what are we waiting fer?
!!�I feared you had fallen in battle!
1�Despite all you have been through, your first thoughts turn to my safety. I am deeply touched.
1�Before he vanished, he told me, ??Leave the safety of the crystal to me.??
1�Yet you were not strong enough to withstand it, and suffered grievous wounds in the struggle.
1�We gathered together to bring your spirit back to the world of the living.
1�Your friends are here, all waiting for you. Please, follow me.
1�Despite all you have been through, your first thoughts turn to my safety. I am deeply touched.
1�Before he vanished, he told me, ??Leave the safety of the crystal to me.??
1�Yet you were not strong enough to withstand it, and suffered grievous wounds in the struggle.
1�We gathered together to bring your spirit back to the world of the living.
1�Even in your weakened state, your powers of perception are unmatched.
1�This is indeed Reisenjima, although not the one you know.
1�Master, it is only a little ways farther. Take it one step at a time.
1�But the orb is nothing more than just a symbol. You needn't carry it with you any longer, for everyone will still be with you.
1�We are all humbled by your service these past fourteen years.8
?��My heart races at the thought of seeing you again in the future that we all know will come.8
,�And it shall arrive faster than we think, as long as Selh'teus's crystal continues to shine.8
h�And though I may have died and been reborn countless times, I look forward to my first birth many years from now.8
1�Fear not. My disappearance only means that my perilous journey to the past is no longer needed.8
h�Or more plainly, that Vana'diel's future is safe.8
,�Master, this is not ??Farewell.??8
?��It is ??See you soon.??8
?��Until our paths cross once more...8
?��...The blessing of Phoenix is yours to wield. 8
?��And I'll be with you, always.8

1�Hey, Man?[/-lady], you come here! Shiftrix knew it, hehehe.
1�This is Shiftrix. Shiftrix sell things. People come to island-rock, buy things from Shiftrix. Man-person from Tenshodo say so.
1�Is Shiftrix from Tenshodo? Who cares? Doesn't matter.
1�Shiftrix sell anyway.
1�If Man?[/-lady] want buy, need escha silt.
1�Man?[/-lady] get silt from monsters. Clobber monsters, get silt. Then trade with Shiftrix.
1�What you want, Man?[/-lady]?
1�What you want, Man?[/-lady]?
1�What you want, Man?[/-lady]?
1�Oh, good. Man?[/-lady] come here just in time.
1�Big dragon monster's  �[coming soon/shown up] here on rock. Very scary. Shiftrix want to clobber, but no can.
1�Good thing Man?[/-lady] here. Take this.
1�What you want, Man?[/-lady]?

1�What would you like to do?Nothing in particular. �[Receive elvorseal/Return elvorseal].Teleport to the target monster.Check area blessings.Receive key items.View grisly trinket notes.Receive vorseals.Return vorseals.Check vorseal effects.Receive temporary items.Hear various explanations.

1�First you need make contract with Shiftrix. Pay 
� silt, then Man?[/-lady] is Shiftrix customer.

1�Pay silt? (current silt: 
�)Yes. (pay 
 silt)Maybe not.
1�Good silt. Nice and gray. Now Man?[/-lady] buy from Shiftrix only. You want something, talk to Shiftrix.
1�No silt? Get out of here, Man?[/-lady].
1�No silt, no sell. Now go away.
1�Man?[/-lady] want check blessings for rock? Okay.
1�Here. Shiftrix write them down. See? Smart.
1�Which active blessing will you check?None of them. Go back.Temperance.Fortitude.Piety.Justice.Hope.Wisdom.Compassion.Dignity.Loyalty.Mercy.Courage.
1�Temperance: Reduces the silt cost of eschan portals.
1�Fortitude: Increases the status effects of vorseals.
1�Piety: Increases the effect duration of vorseals.
1�Justice: Increases ??Treasure Hunter?? ability by 1.
1�Hope: Increases the chances of an emblazoned reliquary appearing.
1�Wisdom: Increases the effect duration of food.
1�Compassion: Increases the ??Refresh?? and ??Regen?? effects of vorseals.
1�Dignity: Increases escha silt yields.
1�Loyalty: Increases escha beads yields.
1�Mercy: ?5???? and 5???? have a chance of not being consumed.
1�Courage: Increases the ??Rare enemy+?? effects of vorseals.
1�Teleport to the target?I'm ready.Not quite yet.
1�Okay, Man?[/-lady]. Clobber time go.
1�Fine. Come back to Shiftrix when ready.
1�Is thing.
1� �[You feel the warmth of the elvorseal's divine protection./The warmth of the elvorseal fades away.]
e.�Alter egos may be used here without any effect on enmit
1�Is free. Man?[/-lady] need thing to clobber.
1�This thing called ??elbowseal.?? If Man?[/-lady] have this, can poof to where Gets-a-goatl be.
1�Shiftrix don't know how work, but it do.
1�So, Man?[/-lady], ready to go poof?
1�Shiftrix thought Man?[/-lady] tough. Not scared of monsters. Fine, Shiftrix take back elbowseal, but disappoint.
